text:
I’m trying to test package using github actions but I get the following error at the `julia-runtests@latest` stage:
```[ Info: Generating custom Julia project ...
ERROR: ArgumentError: Package Pkg not found in current path:
- Run `import Pkg; Pkg.add("Pkg")` to install the Pkg package.```
what could be the issue here?
